main.name: Mannika Garg
main.description: I am highly enthusiatic about AI, embedded systems and IoT.
main.bio: I'm currently working as a Software Development Engineer at Nua (Lagom Labs), gaining good knowledge of full stack web development. During my undergraduate years I have explored various domains ranging from core elctronics, signal processing, machine learining to software development. My core interest lies in machine learning and IoT. Apart for academics, I love playing table tennis, and actively involve myself community activities. I strongly believe in giving back to the society and I'm very consious about the environment.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.school: Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology Delhi
education.degree: Bachelors in Technology, Major: Electronics and Communication Engineering
education.description: During my bachelors I have developed a deep interest in IoT and Machine Learning. I've also organised events and been actively involved in student clubs, sports activities and community service.

With great interest in Mathematics and Physics, I did my higher secondary education in science stream and scored an aggregate of 96% in PCM in class 12. I was awared an Academic Excellence award for being the class topper in class 11th. Here, I've also anchored events and was actively involoved in sports activities.

I was a scholar for 5 consecutive years from classes 6th to 10th for being the class topper. I scored 10 CGPA in class 10th CBSE examinations. Have won various awards for leadership, sports, dance and student clubs. I've also anchored various events.

work.title: Software Development Engineer
work.description: I am working as a full stack web developer. In order to improve customer retention, I've worked on creating AWS lambdas and cron jobs in Node.js. I've a good experience with Magento and HTML, CSS, Vuejs, Javascript, PHP. Working in a startup has given me confidence of taking up big responsibilities at the early stage of my career.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Built a wireless sensor network of radio nodes for prediction and early detection of forest fire. Used Random forest Algorithm for prediction of fire spread and achieved an accuracy of 92.5% on the test data.

work.title: Trainee
work.description: Bharat Electronics Limited is an Indian state-owned aerospace and defence company. It primarily manufacture advanced electronic products for the Indian Armed Forces. During the training I understood the concepts of FPGA design, gained hands on experience on VHDL and exposed to the live demonstration of radar system.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Worked on the frontend web development using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and Javascript on two projects, one is currently being used as food delivery website and the other as Techkatech Innovation Hubâ€™s company website.

projects.category: IoT based handwash dispenser to remind the user to use hand wash when in close proximity of the water tap and monitor their handwashing compliance
